{"id":453110499,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1612682147,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/453110499/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(s.size()==0) return 0;\n        int beg=0,end=0;\n        vector<int> v(128,0);\n        int max1=-1;\n        int m=s.size()-1;\n        while(beg<=m && end<=m){\n            if(v[s[end]]==0){\n                max1=max(max1,end-beg+1);\n                v[s[end]]++;\n            }\n            else{\n                while(s[beg]!=s[end]){\n                    v[s[beg]]--;\n                    beg++;\n                }\n                beg++;\n            }\n            end++;\n        }\n        return max1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
